name: Test the Loop
description:
It's been a long few days, but we're glad to present our first LudumDare demo game: "Test the Loop"

Testing bunnies have one job and one job only - to test stuff. But what happens when something so routine meets experimental time travel?

  • What to do?:
    -complete the test chamber by solving platformer puzzles
    -your death is a restart, creating a second alternative you, that will aid you in avoiding deathly obstacles
  • How to play?:
    -use arrow keys to move around, that's all you will need
Thanks for playing!
